long_description: The men's Smartwool MerinoMax half-zip top combines warm, high-quality merino wool and the perfect amount of stretch to create a versatile top you can wear during training runs in cold weather. Moisture-wicking merino wool resists odors naturally, and substantial midweight fabric offers just the right amount of warmth for activity in the cold. Half-length zipper ventilates instantly to keep you cool when you heat up during activity. Zippered chest pocket features a cord port that works with your media player. Flatlock seam construction reduces chafing; low-profile on-seam thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over top of hands for warmth. The Smartwool MerinoMax half-zip top for men is semifitted.
